      • set_repeat

        public AnimationUtils.Builder set_repeat(int repeat_mode,
                                         int repeat_count)
        Set repetition related variables.
        Parameters:
        repeat_mode - The mode, either: REVERSE or REPEAT
        repeat_count - The amount of repetitions (set to 0 for none and INFINITE for never-ending)
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow chaining methods.

      • build

        public AnimationUtils build()
        Creates a AnimationUtils with the arguments supplied to this builder. It does not AnimationUtils.execute(AnimateListener) the AnimationUtils. Use AnimationUtils.execute(AnimateListener) to start_animation the animation
